about.title: About AGROTM
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing agribusiness with blockchain
about.description: AGROTM is an innovative platform that combines blockchain technology, artificial intelligence and Internet of Things (IoT) to transform the agricultural sector.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Democratize access to agricultural investment and create a sustainable ecosystem that benefits producers, investors and consumers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading global agricultural tokenization platform, connecting traditional agribusiness with the digital economy.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing agribusiness with blockchain technology
about.description: AGROTM is an innovative platform that connects farmers and investors through the world's most advanced blockchain technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Democratize access to cutting-edge agricultural technology and connect rural producers with global investors.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading global decentralized agricultural technology platform, driving sustainability and efficiency in agribusiness.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: All operations are transparent and auditable, ensuring complete trust in our transactions.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Always at the forefront of technology, developing innovative solutions for agribusiness.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to sustainable agricultural practices and environmental responsibility.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of collaboration between producers, investors and technology.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Formed by experts in agribusiness, blockchain and technology, united by the passion to transform global agriculture.
